ISSUE.TITLE: PickupInStore Plugin Country area displayed twice
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.1 Steps to reproduce the problem: When you try to add a new pick up point, it provides a dropdown list and text field as well.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #3246 Added cache cleaning for product images

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3209 Added display of address input fields depending on the address settings
